result.execSummary:
The defendant Angel Erazo Santa was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take >$500 - $5000), a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

2:31 PM (22CF06/22CF75/22TR105/22TR106) Defendant Angel Erazo Santa in court, in custody.  Attorney Alyssa F. George-Stifler in court for Angel Erazo Santa.  Attorney Jin Ho D. Pack in court for State of Wisconsin. Atty George-Stifler appears on cases 22CF06 and 22CF75 only. Victims rights compliance has been met; Court reviews plea agreement, rights, charges, and penalties. As to case 22CF06, count #2, def enters a plea of no contest, case 22CF06 count #3, def enters a plea of guilty. As to case 22CF75, count #1, def enters a plea of guilty. Court makes findings; Court accepts pleas in 22CF06, counts #2 and #3 and case 22CF75, count #1 and finds def guilty. Case 22CF06 counts #1 and #4 are DRI. Case 22CF75, count #2 is DRI. Sentencing arguments heard; def makes statement. Cases 22TR105 and 22TR106 are dismissed. Court heard.

Court imposes the following sentence (case 22CF06):
As to count #2:
60 days DCJ, consecutive to any other sentence previously imposed
As to count #3:
120 days DCJ, consecutive to any other sentence previously imposed
Court costs
DNA + costs
*Presentence credit of 2 days

Court imposes the following sentence (case 22CF75):
12 months IC
24 months ES
*consecutive to any other sentence
Court costs
DNA + costs
*Presentence credit of 1 day
and Stipulation for Cont. of STC
and Stipulation for Cont. of STC

Jury trial on September 21, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Status conference on July 29, 2022 at 09:15 am.
Telephone scheduling conference on June 16, 2022 at 10:30 am.
